|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :Concurrent dual-band, '''2T2R''' (''300''Mbps [11n] max.) @2.4GHz - '''N300''' :'''1T1R''' (''433''Mbps [11ac] / ''150''Mbps [11n] max.) @5GHz - '''AC433''' = '''AC750 class''' "RT-AC53 REV1.0", "H19804PN679A1" and "1619" is silkscreened on the board. *Model Num: 90IG02Z1-BM3000 {{see also|ASUS RT-AC51U}} *'''High-speed performance''': Concurrent speed up to a combined 750Mbps data rate *'''Smart control with ASUSWRT''': With the ASUSWRT dashboard UI, setup, monitor, :and control network applications all in one intuitive area *'''Robust external antenna''': 3 external strong antenna enhances signal transmission *'''Gigabit Ethernet''': Data transfer 10 times faster than 10/100 Fast Ethernet devices *'''High Power Design''': In pursuit of ultimate capability ===Specifications=== * Product Segment: AC750 performance (300+433 Mbps) * Memory: 8MB Flash, 64MB RAM * Operating Frequency: 2T2R 2.4 GHz / 1T1R 5 GHz * Guest Network: 3x 2.4 GHz, 3x 5 GHz * Antenna: 3x External antenna * Ports: 1x WAN GbE (RJ45), 2x LAN GbE (RJ45) * Operation mode: Wireless Router, Range Extender, Access Point * Dimensions (W x D x H): 320 mm x 190 mm x 35 mm * Weight: 285 g ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/36-reviews/reviews/219-asus-rt-ac53 ''Asus RT-AC53'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU) (internal images) *[http://www.modlabs.net/blogs/asus-rt-ac53-and-asus-rp-ac68u ''Asus RT-AC53 & RT-AC68U'' on '''ModLabs'''] (RU) *[https://3dnews.ru/946019 ''Asus RT-AC53 rewiew'' on '''3D|News'''] (RU) :Chipsets: [[MediaTek]] [http://www.MediaTek.com/products/homeNetworking/mt7620n-a MT7620A] (2T2R 802.11bgn WiSoC) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A, [http://www.MediaTek.com/products/broadbandWifi/mt7610e MT7610E] (1T1R 802.11an/ac) :Switch: [[Realtek]] [http://www.realtek.com.tw/products/productsView.aspx?Langid=1&PFid=15&Level=5&Conn=4&ProdID=300 RTL8367RB] GbE (1x WAN, 2x LAN) ===Forum threads=== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?33775-Asus-RT-AC85U-RT-AC58U-RT-AC53-and-RT-AC1200GU ''Asus RT-AC85U, RT-AC58U, RT-AC53 and RT-AC1200GU'' on '''wl500g.info'''] :ASUS RT-AC53 (Wireless-AC750) - FW 3.0.0.4.380.6038 (2016/09/26) :[[MediaTek]] MT7620A/MT7610E (ePA/eLNA), RAM 64MB, Flash 8MB, GbE 
#############################################################
# MTK platform, linux-2.6.36.x
# Valild option for BOOT_FLASH_TYPE are shown below:
#	NOR, SPI, NAND
# Valild option for DRAM are shown below:
#	8M, 16M, 32M, 64M, 128M, 256M
# Valid option for SECOND_IF are shown below:
# 	NONE, MT7610
# 	RT3092, RT5392, RT5592, RT3593, RT3572, RT5572 (TBD) 
##############################################################
 
export RT-AC53 := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y MT7620=y 
EBTABLES=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y AUTODICT=y SHP=y RTAC53=y 
SFP=y ODMPID=y LED_ALL=y NEW_RGDM=y RA_SKU=y RA_SKU_IN_DRV=y 
DEBUGFS=y LAN50=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y REPEATER=y 
TCODE=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y BTN_WPS_ALLLED=y SSH=y NEWSSID_REV2=y 
ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y BUILD_NAME="RT-AC53" \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI SPI_FAST_CLOCK=y \
	DRAM=64M \
	SECOND_IF=MT7610E EDCCA=y RALINK_DFS=y \
	EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7620_BAUDRATE=115200 RT2880_DRAM_64M=y 
        EXTERNAL_PA_EXTERNAL_LNA=y RT2860V2_AP_RTMP_INTERNAL_TX_ALC=n
        UBOOT_CMDLINE=y SWITCH_CHIP_RTL8367RB=y SWITCH_CTRLIF_MDIO=y 
        RAETH_HAS_PORT5=y P5_RGMII_TO_MAC_MODE=y MODEL_RTAC53=y"
==See also== {{ASUS AC products}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
